550f378d-2941-427f-9f0f-300bb06c7db2.description: The Podium Access Course badge holder understands the scientific basis for psychometric testing, and can understand and describe psychological theories of individual differences important in testing. They understand how to choose which tests to use, how to effectively deliver those to test takers and how to interpret and use test results appropriately. Badge holders can apply their knowledge and skills within an ethical framework that ensures test practice is fair and inclusive.
550f378d-2941-427f-9f0f-300bb06c7db2.name: Podium Access Course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 12 short modules which have built in assessment at the end of each one. Immediate feedback is provided on answers for each question. Achieve 80% or above to progress to the subsequent module.
Complete a simulated exercise in Test Administration, demonstrating appropriate communication, participant support and informed consent process. Submission is a tutor marked worksheet.
Completion of the course qualifies the badge holder for the BPS Assistant Test User Certificate

a4ecc2e3-12aa-4667-ab0e-bfb37dc57622.description: Badge holders understand psychological theories of individual differences in ability and use tests based on those theories. They can critically evaluate ability tests by understanding test construction, reliability and validity as it applies to ability tests, evaluate tests and test use practices for bias and fairness, understand and apply population statistics supporting test interpretation, and give oral and written feedback on ability test results to test takers and decision makers.
a4ecc2e3-12aa-4667-ab0e-bfb37dc57622.name: Podium's BPS EFPA Test User Ability Course

badge_template_activities.title: Must have successfully completed the Podium Access Course (PAC) conferring eligibility for the EFPA BPS Assistant Test User Certificate. This Test User Ability Course is usually undertaken concurrently with Podium's EFPA BPS Test User Personality Course.
Submit a tutor marked worksheet at the end of each module demonstrating understanding of concepts, principles, theories or practices as appropriate.

Demonstrate competence in the end to end ability assessment process by: Using ability test results obtained in the Test Administration assignment undertaken in the foundation course (Podium Access Course), giving oral feedback to the test participant; submitting effectively modified computer generated reports, adding value to those reports by integrating information and evidence gained in the oral feedback process.
Completion of the course qualifies the badge holder for the BPS Occupational Test User (Ability) Certificate

1643e62b-c846-4df2-aa50-41188fb3bc31.description: Badge holders understand psychological theories of individual differences in personality and can use assessments based on those theories. They can critically evaluate personality assessments by understanding test construction, reliability and validity, evaluate personality assessment for bias and fairness, understand and apply population statistics supporting results interpretation, and give oral and written feedback on personality assessment results to test takers and decision makers.
1643e62b-c846-4df2-aa50-41188fb3bc31.name: Podium's BPS EFPA Test User Personality Course

badge_template_activities.title: Must have successfully completed the Podium Access Course (PAC) conferring eligibility for the EFPA BPS Assistant Test User Certificate. This Test User Personality Course is usually undertaken concurrently with Podium's EFPA BPS Test User Ability Course.
Submit a tutor marked worksheet at the end of each module demonstrating understanding of concepts, principles, theories or practices as appropriate.

Demonstrate competence in the end to end personality assessment process by: Using personality assessment results obtained in the Test Administration assignment undertaken in the foundation course (Podium Access Course), giving oral feedback to the participant; submitting effectively modified computer generated reports, adding value to those reports by integrating information and evidence gained in the oral feedback process.
Completion of the course qualifies the badge holder for the BPS Occupational Test User (Personality) Certificate

eefa9bb3-c95a-4648-b8bb-9c7403b45f53.description: Designed for those who hold test user qualifications obtained elsewhere, or with substantive test user experience, holders of this badge: Understand Podium's scientific foundations; the research and development behind Podium's assessments; how to select, use and interpret Podium's suite of assessments through the medium of Podium's cloud based assessment platform, Podium365.
eefa9bb3-c95a-4648-b8bb-9c7403b45f53.name: Podium Test User Conversion Course

badge_template_activities.title: Should hold test user qualifications or have substantive experience in using other occupational psychometric assessments.

After attending this course (usually a 4 hour webinar) participants complete their chosen Podium assessments for themselves for experience, and produce reports using their own account on the Podium365 platform.
